DOC.criteria: Patients insomnia Untreated moderate severe sleep apnea Major circadian rhythm disorder Pregnant woman Breastfeeding Cardiac pacemaker Cancer Severe condition related heart , brain , kidney hematopoietic system Severe/unstable angina pectoris Arteria coronaria/ peripheral arterial bypass graft Acute congestive heart failure Renal insufficiency Mechanical intestinal obstruction Any electrical device
